title: Korea's reign is over
body:
Dire Wolves out. Korea sucks.

~~I am now Taiwanese.~~

*EDIT: Flash Wolves suck.

I am now Chinese.

replies.body: You are putting your cart before the horse. They are still in the prelim stage, wait untill best of 5 for the championship.

It's all over, Red Rover.

Korea is washed up. They're gonna get swept by whoever they meet in Paris.

GG.

I loved my lego when I was young, but that was the 80's. Sorry, but the sentimental value of the (star wars) toys is worth far more than monetary value.

To make it worse (and rub salt in the wound), I'm a trekkie and hate all but the original Star Wars trilogy.

Qapla (my name) is Klingon ffs.

Boba Fett sits in conversation with a brass Buddha on a shelf, as is my way.

I'm just gutted that I lost my original Return of the Jedi speeder bike (that blows up into pieces when you press the button on the back).

I still have an original black hand (sith) Luke, so that's cool.

Funny you say this, because I have a lot of Star Wars Lego as part of my unconventional assets portfolio.

If you want me to take both of those off your hands, just ask.

Grats Taiwan, now gain independence from China (sorry if I struck a nerve).

Not that I have anything against Taiwan, I have a Taiwanese Boba Fett action figure that pre-dates Empire Strikes Back (dated 1979 on the leg, Empire film was 1980). I bet that's worth a packet (but I would never sell, as it has sentimental value, which is priceless).

It's funny. Riot Games is owned by China, but it doesn't force us to join their league.

Go Taiwan!

And give me Boba Fett!
